text: The is an electric multiple unit (EMU) train type operated by the Tokyo subway operator Tokyo Metro in Tokyo, Japan, since 1974. The design is based on the earlier Tokyo Metro 6000 series trains used on the Tokyo Metro Chiyoda Line. ==Gallery== File:Tokyo Metro 7105-2005-12-18 1.jpg|Interior File:Tokyo Metro 7022F.jpg|Set 7122 in Indonesia Category:Electric multiple units
title: Tokyo Metro 7000 series
